title: One killed, three injured in truck-car collision near Balkasar Interchange
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 16 (APP):One woman was died and three others were critically injured in an accident between car and a truck near Balkasar Interchange on Tuesday.
According to the spokesperson of National Highways and Motorway Police (NH&MP), the passengers in the car were traveling from Lahore to Islamabad.
The motorway police has reached the spot and started the rescue operation. The dead body and the injured were shifted to the trauma center in Kallar Kahar, the spokesperson said.
According to the preliminary information, the accident happened due to the negligence of the car driver.
